description:
Cottonee, known as the Cotton Puff Pokémon. Cottonee is a small, white Pokémon with cotton-like puffs on the top and bottom of its head. It has two leafy figures on its sides. When attacked, it escapes by shooting cotton from its body, which distracts the attacker. Going wherever the wind takes them, they take shelter beneath big trees on rainy days. It evolves into Whimsicott when exposed to a Sun Stone.
A version exclusive Pokémon in Black version, it must be obtained from a trade with an NPC known as Dye in White version (nicknamed Fluffee) or from another player with Pokémon Black.
name: Monmen
